jobDescription: Data Scientist- Python Appendix:  Functional SkillsSNoFunctional CompetencyFunctional SkillsProficiency Level * 1 Framework design PL2 2 Process Documentation PL1 3 Process Focus PL2 4 Systems Integration PL1 5 System Design PL2 6 System Architecture PL2Behavioral SkillsSNoPrimary SkillProficiency Level * 1 Presentation Skills PL2* Proficiency LegendsProficiency LevelGeneric Reference PL1 The associate has basic awareness and comprehension of the skill and is in the process of acquiring this skill through various channels. PL2 The associate possesses working knowledge of the skill, and can actively and independently apply this skill in engagements and projects. PL3 The associate has comprehensive, in-depth and specialized knowledge of the skill. She / he has extensively demonstrated successful application of the skill in engagements or projects. PL4 The associate can function as a subject matter expert for this skill. The associate is capable of analyzing, evaluating and synthesizing solutions using the skill.
